channel.title: Comments on: Pre ILUG Drinks in London

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@1 and @2 - Great news, will hopefully see you there.</p>
item.content:encoded: @1 and @2 – Great news, will hopefully see you there.

item.title: By: francie
item.dc:creator: francie
item.description: <p>Pending any major airlines blowing up, I'll actually be there too!!!</p>
item.content:encoded: Pending any major airlines blowing up, I’ll actually be there too!!!

item.title: By: Mark Haller
item.dc:creator: Mark Haller
item.description: <p>Sounds a good idea <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /> There'll be two of us coming, or trying our best to come down. I used to work on Leadenhall - will be nice to get back down there <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /><br /><br />How mad is the navigation on the pub website? I know, let's take a lovely old traditional English pub, and then slap the Apple designed navigation on it??? And then on the Contact Us is a link to Apple? What the??<br /><br /><img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /><br /><br />Marky_UK</p>
item.content:encoded:
Sounds a good idea http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ /> There’ll be two of us coming, or trying our best to come down. I used to work on Leadenhall – will be nice to get back down there http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />

How mad is the navigation on the pub website? I know, let’s take a lovely old traditional English pub, and then slap the Apple designed navigation on it??? And then on the Contact Us is a link to Apple? What the??

http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />

Marky_UK
